channel.title: ~~Um serious randomness~~
channel.description:
:confused: :| PROBLEM :| :confused:
Ok, well I've just got my basic server going, (testscape based) and I have reached a stump point. I don't know if its just laziness, but I don't know how to fix all these problems.
First; I spawn (under any username I use) with 5/27 hitpoints. Second; I spawn with level 27 attack. Third; I spawn with all my other stats being 1 and still have a combat level of 126. Forth; I spawn with ALL my "next level" exp being over 14m (meaning to get to level 2 I have to get over 14m experience) [font=Verdana] If [/font] you want to check it out my ip address is "samscape.servebeer.com" "port: 43594"
By the way, thanks heaps for helping me on all my other problems and any help on this topic, (little or large) will, once more, be greatly appreciated.
Thanks again, Hmpph :)

                          :confused: :| PROBLEM  :| :confused:

Ok, well I’ve just got my basic server going, (testscape based) and I have reached a stump point. I don’t know if its just laziness, but I don’t know how to fix all these problems.

First; I spawn (under any username I use) with 5/27 hitpoints.

Third; I spawn with all my other stats being 1 and still have a combat level of 126.

(meaning to get to level 2 I have to get over 14m experience)
